channel.title: Meta on Anaminus.Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Anaminus.Blog

item.title: Repo blog
item.content:encoded: For future reference, my blog is just a git repo, so any changes will be visible at https://github.com/Anaminus/blog

item.title: The episode in which I make a blog
item.content:encoded:
Found a nice tool, found a good workflow. Instead of long chains of tweets and obscurely-located replies, here we have a proper place to write things.

I would have written a shorter letter, but I did not have the time. — Markus Twainicus

This post was originally much longer, but I had the time.
